basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm Errol Vidad a Navy Veteran with a background in Mathematics. While in the Navy, I planned operations to hunt submarines, I oversaw maintenace plans for an engineering plant, and I taught trigonmetry and it's application to Navy tactics. After nearly a decade of active service, I separated and began work as a systems analyst for a Navy website. I was responsible for collecting and understanding customer requirements, I developed documentation, and I provided training on website best practices. Eventually, I decided I wanted to be more involved in tech especially the development side so I left my job to pursue an education in software development. I enrolled and recently completed a 6-month coding bootcamp and now I'm proficient in full-stack application development using Python and JavaScript. I'm currently seeking employment and I'm looking for opportunities with a defense tech company so I can combine my military background and software development skills to help positively impact military or federal organizations.

projects.title: CineMood
projects.description: Finding a movie to watch may take longer than watching a movie. CineMood allows the user to receive a movie recommendation based off the genre they choose and their current mood.

projects.title: Prismatic Puzzle
projects.description: Desktop app developed for users interested in increasing problem-solving skills through a fun and challenging digital puzzle game.

projects.title: Sunbursts
projects.description: Data visualization tool designed to enhance strategic decision-making for BeSpace Consulting services. Generates circular bar plots that visually represent complex datasets for clearer, insight-driven business decisions.
